0.1.3.en: Solved issues with port connection & added manual change port/ip setting.

0.1.4.en: Added more logging and possible fix for some devices that are not found

0.1.5.en: bug in logging and temporarily relaxed ssdp rules for debugging

0.1.7.en: Probable fixes for powering the device using the button

0.1.8.en: Changed the way of disconnecting from the Telnet .destroy instead of .end because some devices does not reply on .end

0.2.0.en: Added input source control and flow cards

0.3.0.en: Added prelimanary support for manual pairing

0.4.0.en: Fix for detecting power-on when manually powering the device

1.0.1.en: More functionality and different device pairing.
